channel.title: Guy Campanile on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Guy Campanile on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘CBS Evening News’ Executive Producer Guy Campanile to Return to ’60 Minutes’
item.description: Guy Campanile, a longtime “60 Minutes” producer who was tasked with managing a significant overhaul of the venerable “CBS Evening News,” is returning to his old stomping ground
